column1: Title: "Efficacy and Safety of Pioglitazone Add-on in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Inadequately Controlled with Metformin and Dapagliflozin: A Multicenter
POPULATION_CRITERIA_INCLUSION: "T2D inadequately controlled with metformin and dapagliflozin"
EXTRACTION_UNCERTAINTIES: "Limited CV events due to short follow-up"
EXTRACTION_NOTES: "Important triple therapy study showing pioglitazone add-on effects to SGLT2i + metformin"
TITLE: Efficacy and Safety of Pioglitazone Add-on in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Inadequately Controlled with Metformin and Dapagliflozin
INCLUSION_CRITERIA: T2D inadequately controlled with metformin and dapagliflozin
